snippet.title: Buggos Dev Trailer
snippet.description:
https://www.reddit.com/r/Buggos/

Buggos is a game all about building, evolving, and controlling a swarm of space bugs. Intent on taking over as many worlds and as much land as possible, the Buggos swarm outward from their spawning pools to destroy all life who dares to oppose them. As you take over more regions and worlds, you gain upgrade stones that can increase the strength and speed of your individual bugs, or can be spent to change the behavior of the entire swarm and how it reacts to different situations. This game is mostly a simulation, where you as the player only make high level decisions and guide the swarm on its journey for galactic domination. You decide where to attack, what upgrades to give, how the swarm should react, what type of Buggos you want to breed, and the overall high level strategy. The rest is up to fate.
